text: Je trouve que sushiman est un restaurant de sushi rapide qui se demarque vraiment des autres ! Les sushi sont toujours tres frais et ils ont une grande variete de produits !   La soupe miso est incroyable, vous devez vraiment l'essayer !

In the fast food world area, Shushiman is my favorite sushi place. I find the people are very sweet and pleasant. I always buy their readymade shushi pack and always add either shrimp or vegetarian printemps makis, which I enormously enjoy.   Since it's is the fashion of poke bowl, Shushiman started the same trend. So I ordered Tuna and Salmon bowl. Compared to Sushi Shop, I really enjoyed the bowl, the ingredients were perfect combination Salmon, tuna, avocado, cucumber, warm rice and two interesting ingredients were  inside: edamame and mango. It was delicious.  It was pricey, with my Perrier drink, it came to 19$. I was happy to try it though.

I LOVE THE SUSHIS HERE!!! No seriously if I dont feel like spending tonnes of money at my other go to Zenya or moderate level Kanda/Tokyo You will most likely find me here where theyre yummy dragon eyes have a combo with miso soup. My usual order from here is avocado with crispy rolls without cucumbers. Love the crispy/spongy texture and Lam one of the employees just always makes it right for me. I am telling you folks take my word next time youre craving sushi and walking through the underground tunnel from McGill to Bonaventure make a stop here and skip other local Sushi expresseses

Donc dans la quête des sushis pas cher de centre-d'achat, Les gens du quadrilatère de PVM (Place Ville-Marie) vont prévaloir Sushiman. Moi je dois dire que c'est mon deuxième choix. Chaque fois que je mange des sushis de centre d'Achat, je recherche la fraicheur - Check Bonne qualité prix - Check Sushi bien fait - BOF! Ça se défait quand t'essaies d'en décoller un à l'autre. Pas CHECK!
Good sushi but worst service ever. They don't even say Hi, Thank you and throw the receipt on the table. Really rude and always talk loud like they are still in Vietnam.
